thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superior customer service!
thread.title_full: Superior customer service! - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Starlingtons
title: Superior customer service!
text: I booked this hotel based on TripAdvisor reviews and was not disappointed. The customer service was excellent. The airport transfer arranged by the hotel from the airport went smoothly. The hotel was able to perfectly accommodate an odd room request I had. My room was very quiet. The minibar restocking was great. Breakfast was wonderful, with lots of super options. My one suggestion would be to offer different hot food options. The hotel offered nine different options every day, but they were the same every day. That is quite minor, but that is the only suggestion I can make for this amazing hotel.
